price: Ɔno na me wͻ anidaasoͻ sε Ɔde me mfomsoͻ bεkyε me wͻ Akatua da no mu.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī aṭmaʿu an yaghfira lī khaṭīatī yawma al-dīni
